name: Carolyn Beer
testomonial: Working with Sagar D. was an absolute pleasure. Their technical expertise, attention to detail, and ability to problem-solve was second to none. Their full-stack development skills allowed them to deliver a seamless user experience with minimal bugs. I highly recommend Sagar D. for any project, big or small.

name: Zao Yang
testomonial: Was responsive and was able to deal with technical video creating.

name: DoWell Research HR
testomonial: was thoroughly impressed with Sagar's React skills. They demonstrated a deep understanding of the framework and built a robust and scalable application that exceeded my expectations. Their attention to detail and ability to work in a team environment made for a smooth development process. I look forward to working with Sagar d. again in the future

name: CoFoundersLab
testomonial: Sagar is a rockstar - Really great at what he does and has a good vision! I recommend to anyone looking for a solid developer! Great work my friend! :)
